data.title: Grant Show Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about Grant Show with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Grew up in Northern California

First major television role was playing Rick Hyde on Ryan's Hope, which earned him a Daytime Emmy nomination in 1987

Played bad boy Jake Hanson on three primetime Aaron Spelling series: Beverly Hills, 90210; Melrose Place; and Models Inc

Won the 20th Anniversary Toyota Pro/Celebrity Race in Long Beach, CA, in 1996

Appeared in the 1999 production of the Pulitzer Prize-winning off-Broadway play Wit

Is an avid golfer
